full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` TSE THAR 'BUL TSUL MU TIG DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES LHA CHEN 'JIGS MED DPA' BO DA YAN TER KHE ZHES GRAGS PA'I ZHING SKYONG CHEN POR TSE THAR 'BUL TSUL MU TIG DO SHAL CES BYA BA 'DI NI, LHA CHEN DE NYID LA TSE THAR PHUL SKABS, RANG GI 'DOD MOS DANG BSTUN TE, PAD DKAR 'CHANG SOGS SKYES CHEN DU MA'I ZHABS DRUL SPYI BOR LEN PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS, DGE MTSAN BCU LDAN DE NYID BZHUGS KHANG PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I NYE CHAR SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
